mapper.select: SELECT b.id Id, b.user_id userId, b.tag, b.date, u.name writer, b.title, b.content, b.view_count viewCount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, view_count = #{viewCount} WHERE id = #{id}
